column3: You will have to submit upstream if you want to modify any of the subtrees in `./src/`
@MarcoFalke How can I submit the changes upstream? With `git push upstream github-docs` in my local repo?
Thanks @MarcoFalke! I updated this pull request by **rebasing the commit**. (I removed the changes in the subtrees and kept the changes in the `./CONTRIBUTING.md` file.)
